name: Skyhigh
description:
Skyhigh - Build your own town of skycrapers.

Main client gameplay is to drop a block when dot is on the middle of screen. Reset does not work in the initial build so you need to reset the game on each go. Stack the blocks high up.

Scores might also be wrong.

Highscore -build shows the highscores as the city you've built.

Game was made in 7h during 7h jam. 

[Edit:] Added second build with fixed bugs & added missing sounds & graphics.
